LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: We couldn't use the diving suits...?

LABEL: 0x35D
STRING: Instantly, my mind went blank.

LABEL: 0x385
STRING: What was Hiragino saying?

LABEL: 0x3AF
STRING: There was no way something like that was true.

LABEL: 0x3DF
STRING: I considered the implications of his words.

LABEL: 0x40F
STRING: The conclusion was easy to reach――

LABEL: 0x431
STRING: 「Ha, ha...」

LABEL: 0x44D
STRING: 「...It's all over, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x4E7
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun――」

LABEL: 0x56D
STRING: 「Isn't that right?!」

LABEL: 0x595
STRING: 「Doesn't that mean there's no way to escape from here?!」

LABEL: 0x60E
STRING: 「If we have nothing to protect us from the pressure of the deep sea, there's no way we can escape.」

LABEL: 0x662
STRING: 「With the rear section submerged, the ship can no longer float on its own.」

LABEL: 0x6AA
STRING: 「So, all that's left for us is to wait for our deaths.」

LABEL: 0x6FD
STRING: 「...That hasn't been decided yet.」

LABEL: 0x738
STRING: 「As long as the threat of <Alice> and <COOS> is there, rescue will not come even if we wait.」

LABEL: 0x78A
STRING: 「The heating has shut down...」

LABEL: 0x7B4
STRING: 「Hypothermia, starvation, viruses... The only thing that hasn't been determined is how we'll die, right?」

LABEL: 0x824
STRING: I could feel the corners of my mouth curl as I spoke.

LABEL: 0x856
STRING: I couldn't stop myself.

LABEL: 0x880
STRING: A dry laugh left my lips.

LABEL: 0x8A8
STRING: I mean, what else could I do?

LABEL: 0x933
STRING: All that was left for us was deep, dark despair.

LABEL: 0x963
STRING: That was all there was―nothing else.

LABEL: 0x99F
STRING: Isn't that right, Hiragino?

LABEL: 0x9BF
STRING: I heard the whispers of the girl with a morbid complexion inside my head.

LABEL: 0xA57
STRING: ――Isn't that right, Katagiri?

LABEL: 0xA7B
STRING: ――There were unlimited possibilities.

LABEL: 0xAAF
STRING: ――Choices.

LABEL: 0xAD1
STRING: ――There was no choice but to push forward without noticing them.

LABEL: 0xB36
STRING: ――By the time we realized what was happening, it was too late.

LABEL: 0xBBE
STRING: I couldn't get Reiri's sarcastic smile out of my head.

LABEL: 0xBE8
STRING: She whispered into my ear, telling me to accept my despair.

LABEL: 0xC71
STRING: ――Yes, that was the correct choice.

LABEL: 0xC99
STRING: Reiri was always right, even if I didn't understand why.

LABEL: 0xCEF
STRING: As long as I did as she said, I would always――

LABEL: 0xD29
STRING: It was only by acting as her hands and feet that we were able to defeat <COOS>.

LABEL: 0xD83
STRING: No matter how much we tried to deny the truth, there was nothing we could do.

LABEL: 0xDD5
STRING: Why didn't we just yield?

LABEL: 0xDF9
STRING: There was no need to think about anything anymore.

LABEL: 0xE21
STRING: Nothing. We didn't need anything. We didn't have to do anything.

LABEL: 0xE59
STRING: Just sink deeper and deeper into darkness.

LABEL: 0xE89
STRING: Deeper and deeper...

LABEL: 0xED7
STRING: ――Do you know what kind of creatures live at the bottom of the sea?

LABEL: 0xF35
STRING: A voice suddenly rang out.

LABEL: 0xF51
STRING: ...Whose voice was that?

LABEL: 0x100D
STRING: It sounded bright, joyful, and hopeful.

LABEL: 0x1043
STRING: I wondered who it belonged to... Maybe it was no one.

LABEL: 0x1073
STRING: Many lives longed for the sea.

LABEL: 0x1099
STRING: We were standing atop countless sacrifices.

LABEL: 0x10CD
STRING: Even if the truth was that elimination occurred slowly through natural selection,

LABEL: 0x110D
STRING: how could we insult them by giving up?

LABEL: 0x114B
STRING: How could I give up?

LABEL: 0x11ED
STRING: I hit a nearby wall with my right hand.

LABEL: 0x1217
STRING: 「...Sorry. I lost my head for a moment.」

LABEL: 0x12B1
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...」

LABEL: 0x12D2
STRING: 「We risked our lives for this, and now I'm trying to act smart?」

LABEL: 0x1308
STRING: 「What a joke, right?」

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: 「That's more like it.」

LABEL: 0x13C9
STRING: Hiragino's face relaxed.

LABEL: 0x13E7
STRING: However, it was only for a moment.

LABEL: 0x147F
STRING: 「But unfortunately, you're correct.」

LABEL: 0x14BB
STRING: 「A change of heart won't change reality.」

LABEL: 0x14FD
STRING: 「Without a way to escape from the <SHEEP III>, there's nothing we can do――」

LABEL: 0x154F
STRING: 「We must have missed something.」

LABEL: 0x1577
STRING: I interrupted Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x1595
STRING: We couldn't admit that there were no means left.

LABEL: 0x15D5
STRING: 「There must be something...」

LABEL: 0x15F9
STRING: 「Even if it's trivial, there must be something we haven't tried yet.」

LABEL: 0x1649
STRING: 「That's the only answer we have.」

LABEL: 0x169D
STRING: Something.

LABEL: 0x16B1
STRING: There had to be something.

LABEL: 0x16D3
STRING: Something we overlooked, something we forgot, something we took for granted and let go.

LABEL: 0x1727
STRING: Even if we saw it, we ignored it.

LABEL: 0x1755
STRING: I had no idea what it was, but I had to find it.

LABEL: 0x17AD
STRING: An overlooked memory.

LABEL: 0x17CD
STRING: The lost <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0x19AA
STRING: A headache suddenly assaulted me.

LABEL: 0x19C8
STRING: Pain ran through me like a bolt of lightning, and my vision flashed black and white.

LABEL: 0x1A19
STRING: 「Are you all right?!」

LABEL: 0x1A3C
STRING: 「Yeah, don't worry...」

LABEL: 0x1A60
STRING: I leaned against the wall as I replied.

LABEL: 0x1AE7
STRING: I wasn't sure why, but... ever since I woke up, I'd been feeling extraordinarily tired, even just standing up.

LABEL: 0x1B35
STRING: My body was perfectly fine, but――

LABEL: 0x1B67
STRING: Every once in a while, my knees suddenly buckled. It must have been a manifestation of my accumulated fatigue.

LABEL: 0x1BB3
STRING: I must have... forgotten something.

LABEL: 0x1BE1
STRING: The explosion in the steam room――

LABEL: 0x1BFF
STRING: There had to be a hint somewhere before it happened.

LABEL: 0x1C3B
STRING: This all started with the sinking of the <SHEEP III>, which I caused.

LABEL: 0x1C84
STRING: Then, there was the search and rescue of Reiri, <COOS>, and... the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x1CC0
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x1CDC
STRING: 「The rescue ship! How could we forget?」

LABEL: 0x1D1E
STRING: 「If that thing can move, there's no need for any tricks.」

LABEL: 0x1D56
STRING: 「Hiragino-san――」

LABEL: 0x1D74
STRING: Maybe I had forgotten about it because I'd hit my head.

LABEL: 0x1DAA
STRING: There was still the rescue ship that ROMLES used to get here.

LABEL: 0x1DE8
STRING: If we used that ship, there was no need to come up with a complicated DIY escape method.

LABEL: 0x1E3B
STRING: We were practically in the clear already... but Hiragino's expression was still grim.

LABEL: 0x1EEB
STRING: 「While you were sleeping after your surgery...」

LABEL: 0x1F1B
STRING: 「Momoi thought of the same thing and went to check.」

LABEL: 0x1F53
STRING: 「The rescue ship won't move.」

LABEL: 0x1F80
STRING: 「...It won't move?」

LABEL: 0x1FA4
STRING: Hiragino nodded in response.

LABEL: 0x2036
STRING: 「It seems to have been broken by someone.」

LABEL: 0x206D
STRING: 「"Someone" again...」

LABEL: 0x2101
STRING: There was "someone" lurking somewhere on this ship.

LABEL: 0x2129
STRING: I didn't know who they were, but they always tried to block our way forward.

LABEL: 0x2179
STRING: If such a person really existed, what was their goal?

LABEL: 0x21C9
STRING: Why were they preventing us from leaving?

LABEL: 0x21FB
STRING: Why didn't they show themselves?

LABEL: 0x2290
STRING: And... why was their endgame so poor?

LABEL: 0x2345
STRING: 「Let's go back to the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x23D1
STRING: 「...Even if it's broken?」

LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: 「Worst-case scenario, all that matters is that it can float.」

LABEL: 0x2436
STRING: 「It doesn't matter if the controls were destroyed and we can't pilot it.」

LABEL: 0x2484
STRING: ...Besides, Yukari might have missed something.

LABEL: 0x2544
STRING: 「I see... You're right.」

LABEL: 0x2568
STRING: 「It's worth a try.」

LABEL: 0x2595
STRING: 「We don't have a lot of time. Let's hurry back.」

LABEL: 0x28CD
STRING: We turned back the way we had come from and headed to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x29A1
STRING: We were constantly running back and forth inside this confined submarine.

LABEL: 0x29EB
STRING: Were we just going around in circles, or were we making progress?

LABEL: 0x2A47
STRING: We wouldn't know until it was all over.

LABEL: 0x2A79
STRING: All we could do was test the possibilities in front of us...

LABEL: 0x2AC3
STRING: The bed curtains were still closed... Which meant Yukari was still unconscious.

LABEL: 0x2B11
STRING: Hiragino stared silently at the curtains.

LABEL: 0x2B41
STRING: He was naturally worried, but――

LABEL: 0x2B69
STRING: Right now, time was of the essence for her as well.

LABEL: 0x2BA1
STRING: I headed straight for the hatch connected to the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x2BF2
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x2C0F
STRING: As I was about to enter the ship with flashlight in hand, I heard my name called and turned around.

LABEL: 0x2CC7
STRING: 「Don't push yourself with your body being like that...」

LABEL: 0x2CF5
STRING: 「I let you walk around without realizing it, but you really should rest――」

LABEL: 0x2D44
STRING: 「I'll be fine. Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x2D6C
STRING: 「Besides, this is out of your and Touri's area of expertise... This is the only thing I can be useful in.」

LABEL: 0x2DE7
STRING: 「...Right, okay.」

LABEL: 0x2E2A
STRING: With Hiragino's agreement, I turned around and finally stepped inside the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x2F02
STRING: It was a small space that I had to enter while kneeling.

LABEL: 0x2F28
STRING: The moment I entered, I felt as if my ears were shut.

LABEL: 0x2F5A
STRING: The light entering the pitch-black cave rapidly faded and disappeared.

LABEL: 0x2FFE
STRING: Illuminating the space with my flashlight, I moved forward.

LABEL: 0x3034
STRING: Unlike the <SHEEP III>, which was designed for the general public,

LABEL: 0x3075
STRING: the rescue ship's interior was unrefined and cramped, with minimal furnishings and equipment.

LABEL: 0x30BD
STRING: There was no light on the gauges and operation panels that were lined up everywhere.

LABEL: 0x30EF
STRING: Careful not to carelessly touch them, I slowly made my way deeper inside.

LABEL: 0x314A
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x3173
STRING: There was a call from behind me.

LABEL: 0x3193
STRING: 「Yeah, all good――

LABEL: 0x3212
STRING: Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x3228
STRING: Was it because I was distracted by his voice?

LABEL: 0x3256
STRING: As I answered, I tripped over nothing and lost my balance.

LABEL: 0x32A1
STRING: 「Are you all right?!」

LABEL: 0x32C2
STRING: 「Y-Yeah. I just tripped... No need to worry.」

LABEL: 0x32FC
STRING: Still, I couldn't believe I had just tripped over nothing.

LABEL: 0x332E
STRING: Was I that tired...?

LABEL: 0x335A
STRING: And, was it counterproductive for me to reply cheerfully so as not to alarm him?

LABEL: 0x3412
STRING: In the meantime, I reached the rescue ship's pilot seat.

LABEL: 0x3456
STRING: The narrow space opened up a little...

LABEL: 0x34E3
STRING: The space was roomy enough to not make me feel uncomfortable while still having the bare minimum.

LABEL: 0x352B
STRING: It was spacious enough for the ship's crew to stand up in.

LABEL: 0x3573
STRING: When I lowered myself into the space and stabilized my body,

LABEL: 0x35A9
STRING: there were a variety of control systems lined up within my reach.

LABEL: 0x35E3
STRING: I reached for a lever that stood out among them.

LABEL: 0x361F
STRING: 「Is this the power switch, or...?」

LABEL: 0x3641
STRING: Judging by the devices in front of me, I wondered if the power was on at all.

LABEL: 0x368D
STRING: I pulled the lever in my hand.

LABEL: 0x3785
STRING: Accompanied by a heavy thud, the gauges lit up.

LABEL: 0x37C7
STRING: It should be safe to turn off my flashlight now.

LABEL: 0x3801
STRING: After turning off the flashlight, I checked the panels and gauges.

LABEL: 0x3843
STRING: The lit parts looked to be gauges that generally represented the situation inside and outside the ship.

LABEL: 0x3895
STRING: The part that looked like the control panel was still blacked out.

LABEL: 0x38D9
STRING: ...It definitely seemed like you couldn't move the ship like this.

LABEL: 0x391B
STRING: Leaving the <SHEEP III> looked to be impossible.

LABEL: 0x3956
STRING: At this rate, there was nothing I could do here...

LABEL: 0x398A
STRING: 「The power is on for now, but...」

LABEL: 0x39BA
STRING: I then heard a voice from outside the hatch.

LABEL: 0x39F3
STRING: 「...How does it look?」

LABEL: 0x3A16
STRING: I responded to his voice calling to me from down the ramp.

LABEL: 0x3A50
STRING: 「It definitely doesn't seem to be working, but I don't know if it's broken yet. I'll tinker with it a little, so give me some time.」

LABEL: 0x3AB2
STRING: Now then――

LABEL: 0x3ACA
STRING: I looked down at the gauges again.

LABEL: 0x3AF0
STRING: Countless buttons were lined up in front of me.

LABEL: 0x3B18
STRING: There were a group of meters before me that I couldn't tell apart.

LABEL: 0x3B68
STRING: Hmm.

LABEL: 0x3B7E
STRING: It was hard to tell.

LABEL: 0x3B96
STRING: It was very hard to tell.

LABEL: 0x3BBC
STRING: The equipment looked to be over a generation old, and I hardly recognized them.

LABEL: 0x3C06
STRING: There were too many buttons and lights that I couldn't tell what they were for at a quick glance.

LABEL: 0x3CB5
STRING: ...This was the worst UI I'd ever seen.

LABEL: 0x3CD3
STRING: The structure of the ship as a submarine was calculated and beautiful, so what was with this half-assed design?

LABEL: 0x3D90
STRING: 「They have no taste, really...」

LABEL: 0x3DBC
STRING: ...No point in complaining, I guess.

LABEL: 0x3DF2
STRING: Anyway, let's do what we can.

LABEL: 0x3E22
STRING: There was no sign of any physical destruction.

LABEL: 0x3E5A
STRING: At a glance, I couldn't tell if something was broken until I turned it on.

LABEL: 0x3EAC
STRING: Which meant the problem was that the control panel was not activated.

LABEL: 0x3EE2
STRING: Was it possible that some cable was disconnected or had poor contact?

LABEL: 0x3F32
STRING: I looked around, but I didn't see any sensitive spots that were exposed.

LABEL: 0x3F8C
STRING: Or, maybe the equipment inside was destroyed by an impact...

LABEL: 0x3FC8
STRING: ...I know I sounded confident earlier, but if the hardware was broken, I could do nothing to fix it.

LABEL: 0x402C
STRING: But it made no sense to consider that possibility from the start; let's start with what I could do instead.

LABEL: 0x4082
STRING: Let's assume that there was nothing wrong with the hardware. So, why didn't the control panel activate?

LABEL: 0x40EA
STRING: ...Think.

LABEL: 0x4108
STRING: If this was artificial sabotage, then...

LABEL: 0x413C
STRING: What was the reason they hadn't physically destroyed it?

LABEL: 0x41CB
STRING: What did this "someone" who broke the rescue ship intend to do afterward?

LABEL: 0x4211
STRING: If their goal was to keep us on the <SHEEP III> at the bottom of the sea,

LABEL: 0x4264
STRING: then even if they succeeded, they would be trapped here with us.

LABEL: 0x42AA
STRING: How were they supposed to escape from that situation?

LABEL: 0x42E6
STRING: 「It'd be a problem if the rescue ship was lost...」

LABEL: 0x431E
STRING: ...That was why they didn't physically destroy it.

LABEL: 0x4350
STRING: All they had to do was give us the illusion that the rescue ship had been broken and that it couldn't be used to escape.

LABEL: 0x4410
STRING: ――Yes, an illusion.

LABEL: 0x4430
STRING: I was asleep when this "someone" had destroyed the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x4470
STRING: It was almost a miracle that I had regained consciousness.

LABEL: 0x44A6
STRING: Except for me, Reiri was the only one who was familiar with equipment and software.

LABEL: 0x44EE
STRING: Considering that she wasn't cooperating with us,

LABEL: 0x452A
STRING: an extremely simple trick to fool Yukari and Hiragino would be enough.

LABEL: 0x45CB
STRING: 「A simple trick...」

LABEL: 0x45F3
STRING: ――Was it just displaying an image of a black screen...?

LABEL: 0x4639
STRING: It was a rudimentary trick that had been used for decades.

LABEL: 0x4675
STRING: But, since nothing would show up on the screen,

LABEL: 0x46A9
STRING: it was hard to tell whether it was powered on or not.

LABEL: 0x46F1
STRING: If that was the illusion being used here, then a reboot should do the trick.

LABEL: 0x474F
STRING: Several keys were set up at the bottom of the panel.

LABEL: 0x4783
STRING: When it came to rebooting, I think you had to press the keys at the same time, but――

LABEL: 0x481C
STRING: 「...I'll just have to do it. There's no point in waiting around.」

LABEL: 0x485E
STRING: After saying it out loud for some reason, I pressed the buttons, and――

LABEL: 0x4967
STRING: ――All right!

LABEL: 0x498E
STRING: 「What's the matter, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x49B7
STRING: 「It's looking good! I managed to turn it on!」

LABEL: 0x49E1
STRING: After a short wait, the control panel displayed a coordinate system and several numerical values.

LABEL: 0x4A25
STRING: Then, the control system emerged in the front of the panel.

LABEL: 0x4A63
STRING: This looked similar to what Yukari used to operate the probe...

LABEL: 0x4A99
STRING: I was about to stick my hand into the cube-shaped hologram but stopped myself.

LABEL: 0x4AD9
STRING: I had no idea how to operate this...

LABEL: 0x4AFF
STRING: If I carelessly used it and ended up ruining something, then...

LABEL: 0x4B49
STRING: I carefully looked at the control panel displaying the depth.

LABEL: 0x4BAB
STRING: 「...Is this the AUTO-mode?」

LABEL: 0x4BD1
STRING: There was a small box at the corner of the screen.

LABEL: 0x4C07
STRING: The word "AUTO" was displayed there in green, hollowed-out letters.

LABEL: 0x4C3B
STRING: We could work with this, right...?

LABEL: 0x4C6B
STRING: The direction didn't matter. All we had to do was surface.

LABEL: 0x4CAD
STRING: So, there was no problem with using AUTO!

LABEL: 0x4CE3
STRING: 「Yes, it's perfect! We can get out using the rescue ship!」

LABEL: 0x4D28
STRING: 「Yahoo!」

LABEL: 0x4D51
STRING: 「Well done!」

LABEL: 0x4D72
STRING: 「I'll be out in a moment.」

LABEL: 0x4DA2
STRING: ――This was perfect.

LABEL: 0x4DBC
STRING: There was no way we couldn't escape after coming this far.

LABEL: 0x4DF0
STRING: Now, literally all that was left was for us to leave.

LABEL: 0x4E7F
STRING: Suppressing my wavering feelings, I turned my body around and kneeled again, heading for the hatch.

LABEL: 0x4ED7
STRING: The conversation I could hear coming from the outside sounded cheerful as well.

LABEL: 0x4F22
STRING: 「Isn't that great, Touri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x4F59
STRING: 「Yeah! Now we can get back to the surface. Everyone will be saved!」

LABEL: 0x4FAC
STRING: 「Yeah... You're right.」

LABEL: 0x4FDD
STRING: 「Thank goodness, really...」

LABEL: 0x500F
STRING: 「Now we just need to hurry and bring Reiri over here!」

LABEL: 0x5052
STRING: ...Right.

LABEL: 0x506C
STRING: There was one thing still left.

LABEL: 0x514F
STRING: "Everyone" included her as well.

LABEL: 0x5197
STRING: Reiri. The girl who had disappeared after the explosion.

LABEL: 0x51BF
STRING: She had been a key player in the extermination of <COOS>, but...

LABEL: 0x51F1
STRING: ...It was she who came up with the plan that caused that explosion in the first place.

LABEL: 0x523D
STRING: Was it exactly as she had intended?

LABEL: 0x527B
STRING: Reiri knew everything.

LABEL: 0x52A1
STRING: And since she did, it wasn't unthinkable to assume so.

LABEL: 0x5366
STRING: ...No, it was pointless to think about it.

LABEL: 0x5390
STRING: It was true that she was instrumental during the extermination of <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x53CE
STRING: but there was no way to confirm my suspicions for now.

LABEL: 0x541A
STRING: I had to find her in order to learn the truth.

LABEL: 0x545A
STRING: And, if I didn't...

LABEL: 0x5490
STRING: Actually, what the hell was she doing in the first place?

LABEL: 0x54CC
STRING: Why hadn't she shown herself at all? What was she thinking?

LABEL: 0x5510
STRING: ...I tried not to think about it,

LABEL: 0x5548
STRING: but I couldn't help but become aware of a certain possibility.

LABEL: 0x55DF
STRING: ――The fact that neither Reiri nor our obstructor had shown themselves.

LABEL: 0x5619
STRING: The person who'd stolen the cure for <Alice> and had made it look like the rescue ship was broken...

LABEL: 0x5667
STRING: Wasn't the true identity of that person Reiri?

LABEL: 0x569F
STRING: I didn't want to suspect her, but I couldn't deny the possibility either.

LABEL: 0x56E5
STRING: At first glance, she might seem cynical and full of snide remarks,

LABEL: 0x5727
STRING: but I was sure she wasn't lying about her desire to escape she'd told me in the steam room before the explosion.

LABEL: 0x57DE
STRING: ――And, just then...

LABEL: 0x58F9
STRING: Inside the small rescue ship...

LABEL: 0x5913
STRING: The gauges were lit up, making the way to the hatch a little more visible.

LABEL: 0x595B
STRING: I could see the hatch a few meters ahead of me. It was a short distance away.

LABEL: 0x5993
STRING: The space was narrow and dimly lit.

LABEL: 0x59BB
STRING: Functionally beautiful equipment was lined up all around me.

LABEL: 0x59E1
STRING: And... there, on the floor.

LABEL: 0x59FD
STRING: My eyes were glued to a spot on the floor.

LABEL: 0x5B02
STRING: Why...? No, that wasn't it.

LABEL: 0x5BFB
STRING: Before I knew it... No.

LABEL: 0x5C1D
STRING: This was impossible.

LABEL: 0x5C37
STRING: Something that shouldn't be happening was happening.

LABEL: 0x5C67
STRING: I was staring right at it.

LABEL: 0x5CEC
STRING: At Nomura Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5D04
STRING: She was lying there, in the middle of this unrefined space.

LABEL: 0x5D72
STRING: I was so surprised that I couldn't even speak.

LABEL: 0x5D9A
STRING: I almost forgot to breathe.

LABEL: 0x5DC6
STRING: I was so confused that I couldn't even come up with the appropriate questions.

LABEL: 0x5DF8
STRING: This situation was abnormal.

LABEL: 0x5E10
STRING: ――Calm down.

LABEL: 0x5E2C
STRING: Let's go over what happened... No, that's not it.

LABEL: 0x5E64
STRING: What was it that made this situation so abnormal?

LABEL: 0x5EA2
STRING: ...The answer was simple.

LABEL: 0x5EBC
STRING: There was a girl who shouldn't be here before me.

LABEL: 0x5F59
STRING: There was only one entrance and exit. Hiragino and Touri had been in the emergency room the whole time.

LABEL: 0x5FB7
STRING: They didn't seem to have noticed anything.

LABEL: 0x5FE5
STRING: In other words, in this short period of time, she had appeared out of nowhere――

LABEL: 0x602F
STRING: How?

LABEL: 0x6055
STRING: Had I just not noticed her in the darkness?

LABEL: 0x6091
STRING: ...No, that couldn't be it.

LABEL: 0x60C3
STRING: She was impossible to miss in a small space like this.

LABEL: 0x60FB
STRING: I hadn't noticed anything when I came through here earlier――

LABEL: 0x612F
STRING: And, more importantly...

LABEL: 0x614F
STRING: ――More importantly, the reason this situation was abnormal was――!

LABEL: 0x6280
STRING: My heart was beating like crazy.

LABEL: 0x62A0
STRING: I felt dizzy.

LABEL: 0x62BA
STRING: I wanted to lose consciousness... To escape from reality.

LABEL: 0x62F4
STRING: I had a bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0x6312
STRING: The reality in front of me might as well be a nightmare――

LABEL: 0x6366
STRING: I had to check.

LABEL: 0x6386
STRING: I slowly reached out my hand toward the collapsed Reiri.

LABEL: 0x63BE
STRING: Just to make sure...

LABEL: 0x63DC
STRING: That the worst hadn't happened.

LABEL: 0x640C
STRING: That the nightmare was nothing more than that――

LABEL: 0x6515
STRING: ...That's right. I was sure she was just sleeping.

LABEL: 0x6549
STRING: She had slept for half a day after we had first found her, as well.

LABEL: 0x6583
STRING: Considering her contribution to our victory over <COOS>,

LABEL: 0x65BF
STRING: it made sense that she would be tired.

LABEL: 0x65E3
STRING: That had to be it.

LABEL: 0x6601
STRING: ...Or, maybe she got infected with <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x6647
STRING: If that was the case, she was the same as Yukari. We had to hurry.

LABEL: 0x6683
STRING: We needed to get the two of them out of here and quick...

LABEL: 0x6712
STRING: ...Fearfully, I reached out my hand.

LABEL: 0x673C
STRING: I slowly touched her.

LABEL: 0x677C
STRING: ――She was cold.

LABEL: 0x6796
STRING: Not the slightest bit of rhythm could be felt from her slender wrist.

LABEL: 0x67CE
STRING: There was no pulse.

LABEL: 0x6827
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x6852
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x68CE
STRING: ...The voices calling from the other side of the hatch brought me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x6915
STRING: 「Is everything okay?」

LABEL: 0x693A
STRING: 「Ah, well...」

LABEL: 0x6967
STRING: 「If something happened, I'll help―――」

LABEL: 0x69FF
STRING: 「It's fine!!」

LABEL: 0x6A1B
STRING: ...Don't come here.

LABEL: 0x6A35
STRING: I shouted my answer immediately.

LABEL: 0x6A5B
STRING: It would be bad if she was seen.

LABEL: 0x6A81
STRING: Reiri's... Her corpse couldn't be found.

LABEL: 0x6AB9
STRING: Touri must not find out.

LABEL: 0x6AE9
STRING: There was no way she would remain sane after learning that her sister was dead,

LABEL: 0x6B27
STRING: when she'd been as deranged as she was just from being separated from her earlier.

LABEL: 0x6B72
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun...?」

LABEL: 0x6B93
STRING: 「Sorry... I just tripped again.」

LABEL: 0x6BC9
STRING: 「I'll be out in a second, so just wait there.」

LABEL: 0x6E75
STRING: There were many things I had wanted to ask her.

LABEL: 0x6EAD
STRING: I thought I would get all the answers from her.

LABEL: 0x6EE7
STRING: But, I wondered why...

LABEL: 0x6F09
STRING: Every single one of the countless questions and doubts that I had were now drowned out.

LABEL: 0x6F61
STRING: They were now as distant as the stars. The countless clues fizzled out, and all that remained were rising shadows despite the darkness.

LABEL: 0x6FBD
STRING: Why had Reiri collapsed in a place like that?

LABEL: 0x6FFB
STRING: Why had she died?

LABEL: 0x70EB
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x710A
STRING: When I stepped out of the hatch, I found Touri waiting for me.

LABEL: 0x7199
STRING: She stood there slenderly and looked into my face with concern.

LABEL: 0x71E6
STRING: 「What's wrong? Did something bad happen again?」

LABEL: 0x7229
STRING: 「No... Nothing like that.」

LABEL: 0x72B9
STRING: 「That's a lie.」

LABEL: 0x7333
STRING: As she spoke, she brought her face close to mine.

LABEL: 0x7369
STRING: She was close enough for our noses to touch.

LABEL: 0x739B
STRING: Suddenly, a clean scent wafted through the air.

LABEL: 0x73C7
STRING: Unlike her twin sister, she was tall enough to look straight at me.

LABEL: 0x740F
STRING: 「T-Touri...」

LABEL: 0x743C
STRING: 「You're awfully pale, in case you haven't noticed...」

LABEL: 0x7532
STRING: 「There's no way it's nothing!」

LABEL: 0x756C
STRING: Touri scolded me like I was a child.

LABEL: 0x7596
STRING: She sounded like a mother... or, a sister.

LABEL: 0x762D
STRING: 「I'm fine... There's no need to worry.」

LABEL: 0x76CD
STRING: 「Even if you say that, I am worried.」

LABEL: 0x7702
STRING: 「I'm just a little tired.」

LABEL: 0x7742
STRING: I sat down at Hiragino's desk after brushing her off.

LABEL: 0x7772
STRING: It wasn't a lie that I was nearing my limit.

LABEL: 0x77A8
STRING: ――This was just another secret to add to the pile.

LABEL: 0x77D4
STRING: Should I tell Touri about Reiri's death?

LABEL: 0x7808
STRING: Or, would I be able to keep it hidden?

LABEL: 0x783E
STRING: Honestly, I shouldn't be hiding anything from her.

LABEL: 0x78D1
STRING: But would she stay sane after hearing about her death?

LABEL: 0x791D
STRING: If she went on a rampage or tried to follow in her footsteps...

LABEL: 0x79CD
STRING: ――That wouldn't be good.

LABEL: 0x79E7
STRING: As I thought, it was better to hide Reiri's death.

LABEL: 0x7A17
STRING: My priority was to return Touri safely to the surface. To that end, telling her about her sister was too risky.

LABEL: 0x7A71
STRING: However, even if I hid the truth from her, how was I supposed to get Touri to leave?

LABEL: 0x7AD1
STRING: No matter how thoroughly we searched the <SHEEP III>, there was no way we'd find Reiri.

LABEL: 0x7B26
STRING: There was no way that Touri would agree to leave without her.

LABEL: 0x7B7A
STRING: What was I supposed to do――?

LABEL: 0x7BFB
STRING: A tall shadow loomed over me as I held my head in my hands, making my vision a little darker.

LABEL: 0x7CB5
STRING: 「...Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x7CD1
STRING: 「Fortunately, you haven't exhibited any of the symptoms of <Alice> yet.」

LABEL: 0x7D15
STRING: 「But, we can't be sure that you're not infected.」

LABEL: 0x7D4B
STRING: 「I'm bound to get sick sooner or later, at the very least.」

LABEL: 0x7DB5
STRING: 「We don't have much time.」

LABEL: 0x7DD5
STRING: 「Let's find Reiri-kun and return to the surface as soon as we can.」

LABEL: 0x7E18
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x7E4C
STRING: ...Hiragino didn't know about her death either, of course.

LABEL: 0x7E84
STRING: He and I shared the same desire to get Touri back safely to the surface.

LABEL: 0x7ECE
STRING: In which case, it would be better to cooperate with Hiragino

LABEL: 0x7F1E
STRING: rather than try and keep things a secret from both of them.

LABEL: 0x7F52
STRING: ...Could we talk alone somewhere?

LABEL: 0x7F8E
STRING: But if we did, that would mean leaving Touri by herself...

LABEL: 0x7FD6
STRING: Was I going to leave her alone on a ship that might have the person who killed Reiri lurking around?

LABEL: 0x8042
STRING: And then, I realized something.

LABEL: 0x8060
STRING: What if the person who murdered Reiri...

LABEL: 0x8088
STRING: ――Was the same person who stole the cure?

LABEL: 0x80AE
STRING: It might not have been Reiri after all.

LABEL: 0x80E2
STRING: Was there still "someone" we didn't know about lurking inside the <SHEEP III>...?

LABEL: 0x812F
STRING: However, the only other person on this ship besides us

LABEL: 0x8185
STRING: was that man who'd been attacked by <COOS>――

LABEL: 0x81BD
STRING: 「...Is he not dead?」

LABEL: 0x8255
STRING: 「He?」

LABEL: 0x8274
STRING: 「The man who got attacked by <COOS>.」

LABEL: 0x8310
STRING: 「...What are you talking about?」

LABEL: 0x834B
STRING: Hiragino tilted his head.

LABEL: 0x8369
STRING: ――Oh, right.

LABEL: 0x8383
STRING: The only people who'd been there were me, Yukari, Reiri... and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x83C5
STRING: Neither Hiragino nor Touri had seen him.

LABEL: 0x84B3
STRING: 「There might be someone else on the ship besides us.」

LABEL: 0x84FE
STRING: 「Someone other than Reiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x8529
STRING: 「The man who came on that rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x8564
STRING: 「...Come to think of it, I haven't seen him at all.」

LABEL: 0x859B
STRING: 「He was attacked by <COOS>――」

LABEL: 0x85C9
STRING: 「However, we didn't check if he was dead.」

LABEL: 0x8612
STRING: 「...What are you trying to say?」

LABEL: 0x863F
STRING: Hiragino looked doubtful.

LABEL: 0x8661
STRING: That was natural.

LABEL: 0x8681
STRING: The man who got attacked by <COOS>...

LABEL: 0x86A5
STRING: Normally, we wouldn't think of the possibility that he was alive at all.

LABEL: 0x86EB
STRING: But, if we considered him to be alive, it was natural to grow suspicious.

LABEL: 0x8794
STRING: 「――I can't say for sure right now.」

LABEL: 0x87BC
STRING: 「All I can say is that there's someone who harbors ill will toward us.」

LABEL: 0x8837
STRING: 「...I understand.」

LABEL: 0x885A
STRING: 「Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x8876
STRING: 「I'll tell you later, I promise.」

LABEL: 0x8896
STRING: Hiragino looked me in the eye and nodded.

LABEL: 0x88BE
STRING: Even after all my lies, he still believed me like this...

LABEL: 0x88FE
STRING: As for Touri...

LABEL: 0x8956
STRING: I surveyed my surroundings, trying to locate her.

LABEL: 0x89F0
STRING: 「Katagiri-san would never lie, right?」

LABEL: 0x8A83
STRING: 「Reiri took a liking to you, so I trust you as well.」

LABEL: 0x8B4C
STRING: 「Oh, that's right!」

LABEL: 0x8B6F
STRING: I could say nothing before her pure eyes.

LABEL: 0x8BA5
STRING: Watching me, Touri held her right arm up in front of her and spoke with a hint of pride.

LABEL: 0x8C63
STRING: 「POL.」

LABEL: 0x8CB0
STRING: 【What is it, Nomura Touri?】

LABEL: 0x8CD0
STRING: POL replied to her right away.

LABEL: 0x8CF5
STRING: Before I knew it, Touri had completely mastered using POL.

LABEL: 0x8D45
STRING: 「Do you know who's on this ship besides us?」

LABEL: 0x8D82
STRING: 【Who is included in "us?"】

LABEL: 0x8DBC
STRING: 【What is the boundary?】

LABEL: 0x8E50
STRING: 「Eeeh?」

LABEL: 0x8E6F
STRING: 【In pre-modern society, the people within visible range,

LABEL: 0x8EAD
STRING: in other words,

LABEL: 0x8EF7
STRING: the people connected by bloodlines and tradition, were recognized as communities.】

LABEL: 0x8F3B
STRING: 【It wasn't until Gutenberg's time that this sense of community spread beyond what was visible.】

LABEL: 0x8FA7
STRING: POL started talking.

LABEL: 0x8FC2
STRING: Touri, completely overwhelmed, opened her mouth wide and let out a strange sound.

LABEL: 0x9018
STRING: Frankly, I didn't care about the community theory in our current situation.

LABEL: 0x9052
STRING: But for some reason, I felt grateful that the atmosphere of the room had become a bit more relaxed.

LABEL: 0x909C
STRING: Could POL actually read the mood?

LABEL: 0x912B
STRING: 【Printing was a revolutionary technology that could be counted as one of the three great inventions.】

LABEL: 0x918C
STRING: 「Printing...?」

LABEL: 0x91B1
STRING: Touri was engrossed in her conversation with POL.

LABEL: 0x91FE
STRING: Seeing an opening, I whispered into Hiragino's ear.

LABEL: 0x92F0
STRING: 「Hiragino-san, on this ship――」

LABEL: 0x9386
STRING: 「There's someone else here?」

LABEL: 0x93BA
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x93D4
STRING: 「They're probably the same person who tampered with the rescue ship as well.」

LABEL: 0x9426
STRING: 「It could be the man who got attacked by <COOS>, or someone else.」

LABEL: 0x94D4
STRING: 「Is that so...」

LABEL: 0x94F0
STRING: 「Either way, I assume he's wearing a ROMLES uniform.」

LABEL: 0x9532
STRING: 「Besides, If he's an adult man, it'd be hard to mistake him for Reiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x9583
STRING: 「...I'd like to have a word with you about that.」

LABEL: 0x95B5
STRING: I got up, took a breath, and confided in Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x9650
STRING: 「Just now, Reiri was――」

LABEL: 0x96FE
STRING: 「Did something happen to Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x9727
STRING: 「T-Touri?!」

LABEL: 0x9745
STRING: Before I knew it, Touri, who should have been facing away from us, was right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x9785
STRING: 「W-When did you get there?!」

LABEL: 0x9821
STRING: 「Huh? I've been here the whole time...」

LABEL: 0x9854
STRING: Touri stared blankly at me.

LABEL: 0x9876
STRING: She didn't seem to understand my surprise.

LABEL: 0x9920
STRING: 「So?」

LABEL: 0x9968
STRING: 「You said something about Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x999B
STRING: She urged me on without any suspicion and with a carefree look on her face.

LABEL: 0x99D7
STRING: Unable to look her straight in the eye,

LABEL: 0x9A11
STRING: I lowered my gaze in confusion.

LABEL: 0x9A41
STRING: 「Ah, well... I was just thinking that Reiri was doing something in the laboratory a while ago.」

LABEL: 0x9AF7
STRING: 「A while ago?」

LABEL: 0x9B1A
STRING: 「Uh, I think it was yesterday――」

LABEL: 0x9B57
STRING: 「...That's more than "a while"...」

LABEL: 0x9B8A
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x9BA6
STRING: She was being pretty relentless, wasn't she?

LABEL: 0x9C21
STRING: But, as Touri saw me panic, she giggled for some reason.

LABEL: 0x9C7A
STRING: 「You really are tired, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x9D0B
STRING: 「Pull yourself together, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x9D3C
STRING: She was holding my hand before I had time to react.

LABEL: 0x9D72
STRING: I reflexively squeezed back her soft and warm hand.

LABEL: 0x9E73
STRING: 「Now, let's go look for Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x9F07
STRING: 「Yeah, let's all get out of here.」

LABEL: 0x9F78
STRING: With that, we started walking down the dark hallway once more.
